title: kassawin is back .-.
body:
Since the skin release I've played against quite a few kassadins....and they fucking hurt.
Those buffs on pbe might break him .-. I like how he is now. I don't wanna see him get op again then nerfed to shit again . Keep kassawin like this plz
Edit : I'm not saying he is OP I'm saying he is perfectly balanced as is and any further buffs might break him

replies.body: An assassin hurts? Go figure.
If he hurts already.....and they buff his damage....what's gonna happen?
He should pretty much never WIN lane, so if you manage to feed a kassadin pre roa then you were gana lose anyways.
I'm talking level 1,2,3,4....he bullies me out of lane hard and once he gets sheen I can't fight him without jungle help. Maybe it's just me being bad but he hurts more then leblanc , to me

"maybe it's just me being bad but he hurts more then leblanc"

It's just you being bad. As someone who plays tons of Kassadin, this is actually painful to read because of how much bull it contains. At least it's possible to counter Kassadin somewhat by positioning well and abusing his long cooldowns (I don't just play him, I've had plenty of games against Kassadins), unlike LB who will just spam Q (which has no cooldown whatsoever) and get her W off when you move too close once.
He doesn't have a single ability whos base dmg is 200...

Kassadin has always been good. He's one of my main mid laners.
The reason people think he's underpowered is because he has a shitty laning phase, is only average when not fed, and is rarely played. I have at least a 60% win rate on Kassadin myself.

He was never buffed, shut your pie whole, do not let this spiral out of control like the boards did with Veigar.
Nothing has changed, he wasn't buffed, he wasn't nerfed, he wasn't reworked, heck unlike Veigar he wasn't even touched. Just leave it alone he's exactly the same.

Sheesh play one game against him and he wins suddenly he's OP... rip

> [{quoted}](name=Coriandr,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=0ecjRh6b,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2015-10-23T02:25:42.685+0000)
>
> Kassadin has always been good. He's one of my main mid laners.
> The reason people think he's underpowered is because he has a shitty laning phase, is only average when not fed, and is rarely played. I have at least a 60% win rate on Kassadin myself.
> 
> He was never buffed, shut your pie whole, do not let this spiral out of control like the boards did with Veigar.
> Nothing has changed, he wasn't buffed, he wasn't nerfed, he wasn't reworked, heck unlike Veigar he wasn't even touched. Just leave it alone he's exactly the same.
> 
> Sheesh play one game against him and he wins suddenly he's OP... rip

He has a buff to his Q and a buff to his W up on the pbe server, which is what the OP is referring to. 

It sounds like you don't think he needs buffs and is good. So we can count on you to say the buffs were unnecessary and unneeded when they go live, right?

Yes, I don't think he needs buffs. I think if he gets buffed at all it shouldn't be his damage or mobility but rather his defense simply because its hard to jump in, kill somebody, and jump out without being CC'd or bursted. But that's easily covered with RoA, Rylai's, and against a lot of AP, Abyssal Scepter.

I think Kassadin will always stay a step below Zed because Zed has AD and can take down towers and deal more consistent damage, plus can jump out of a fight faster since his ult only takes 1 second to blink back to the shadow and his W can blink instantly. And I think Talon will always be ahead simply because he has a lot more AOE and team fight power.
For Kassadin to be any more than he is, yes, I agree, he'd probably be pretty OP with either crazy mobility, or crazy damage(or possibly a mix).
Kassadin main here, the buffs are not needed at all and make me terrified because I know it'll lead to him getting gutted.

> [{quoted}](name=MCBiggah99,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=0ecjRh6b,comment-id=000600000002,timestamp=2015-10-23T17:51:07.641+0000)
>
> Kassadin main here, the buffs are not needed at all and make me terrified because I know it'll lead to him getting gutted.

I really wouldn't be worried. They are relatively minor buffs that probably aren't going to make him broken. Just a little cooldown reduction and minor AP ratio increase.
This^
I'm not asking for nerfs I'm saying he's perfectly fine as he is now. I'm not bitching about losing to him.  I'm saying if they buff him people will start bitching again of how op he is
Let me make it clear kass 7 and 0 no one cares fizz 2 and 0 and he is fed

> [{quoted}](name=khorney,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=0ecjRh6b,comment-id=000600010000,timestamp=2015-10-23T16:50:34.432+0000)
>
> Let me make it clear kass 7 and 0 no one cares fizz 2 and 0 and he is fed

Fizz 0 and 17: everyone focusses Fizz anyways. He's just hated that much.
They buffed his ulta few patches ago.
Oh yeah, I forgot they added the AP ratio to it.
i mean sure he has a silence but that only lasts for less than 0.5s

> [{quoted}](name=city of refuge,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=0ecjRh6b,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-10-23T02:06:20.852+0000)
>
> i mean sure he has a silence but that only lasts for less than 0.5s

what? no he doesn't
more or less i mean technically it stops all channeled abilities for 0.5 seconds which is pretty much a silence.
He's annoying because hes mobile, a 6 second mana costing flash is annoying but you can play around it
You do realize that the mana cost doubles to 800 is that worth it ....
There is in no way shape or form that kass is op. Lets see high cd low damage moves not good ratios how is that op
I dont know man, even when Kass is fed he never feels as overbearing as an Annie, Kat, or Leblanc.
Exactly . But if he was at their level people would qq. Don't you like how he is right now? You can still kill him but in the right hands he's still a good pick?
You DO realize that his winrate is like 30% right?
Keep in mind almost no one Plays him since nerfs but he is in fact still really good right now
at least more people are realizing that he's not shit
He's super annoying but has no waveclear. Easy to push and roam which is what I do since wasting spells to watch him frolic away like he hasn't a care in the world is super frustrating.
I think that they should change e from 6 charges to 5 or maybe even 4 and decrease the mana cost on r a bit
He needs something because he really sucks right now.
